game.name: Dezinsector
game.shortDescription: Protect the candy from insects and earn money. Hordes of insects will try to break through the defense. Give them a hard fight
game.shortDescriptionEn: Protect the candy from insects and earn money. Hordes of insects will try to break through the defense. Give them a hard fight

reviewHighlights.text: Dezinsector is yet another construction kit template copy+paste from serial shovelware pushers, Laush Studio. These guys (or just one guy flipping acc...
Short, basic, cheap, functional, simple, tower defence, fun, Completed game with 100% achievements in 1.2 hours. Refunded? Nah, enjoy your Â£0.40 dev!
